memberdef.name: MMAP_DEFAULT
memberdef.initializer: ((dev_zero_fd < 0) ? \ (dev_zero_fd = open("/dev/zero", O_RDWR), \ mmap(0, (s), MMAP_PROT, MMAP_FLAGS, dev_zero_fd, 0)) : \ mmap(0, (s), MMAP_PROT, MMAP_FLAGS, dev_zero_fd, 0))

memberdef.name: compute_tree_index
memberdef.initializer: {\ size_t X = S >> TREEBIN_SHIFT;\ if (X == 0)\ I = 0;\ else if (X > 0xFFFF)\ I = NTREEBINS-1;\ else {\ unsigned int Y = (unsigned int)X;\ unsigned int N = ((Y - 0x100) >> 16) & 8;\ unsigned int K = (((Y <<= N) - 0x1000) >> 16) & 4;\ N += K;\ N += K = (((Y <<= K) - 0x4000) >> 16) & 2;\ K = 14 - N + ((Y <<= K) >> 15);\ I = (K << 1) + ((S >> (K + (TREEBIN_SHIFT-1)) & 1));\ }\ }

memberdef.name: insert_small_chunk
memberdef.initializer: {\ bindex_t I = small_index(S);\ mchunkptr B = smallbin_at(M, I);\ mchunkptr F = B;\ assert(S >= MIN_CHUNK_SIZE);\ if (!smallmap_is_marked(M, I))\ mark_smallmap(M, I);\ else if (RTCHECK(ok_address(M, B->fd)))\ F = B->fd;\ else {\ CORRUPTION_ERROR_ACTION(M);\ }\ B->fd = P;\ F->bk = P;\ P->fd = F;\ P->bk = B;\ }

memberdef.name: unlink_small_chunk
memberdef.initializer: {\ mchunkptr F = P->fd;\ mchunkptr B = P->bk;\ bindex_t I = small_index(S);\ assert(P != B);\ assert(P != F);\ assert(chunksize(P) == small_index2size(I));\ if (RTCHECK(F == smallbin_at(M,I) || (ok_address(M, F) && F->bk == P))) { \ if (B == F) {\ clear_smallmap(M, I);\ }\ else if (RTCHECK(B == smallbin_at(M,I) ||\ (ok_address(M, B) && B->fd == P))) {\ F->bk = B;\ B->fd = F;\ }\ else {\ CORRUPTION_ERROR_ACTION(M);\ }\ }\ else {\ CORRUPTION_ERROR_ACTION(M);\ }\ }

memberdef.name: unlink_first_small_chunk
memberdef.initializer: {\ mchunkptr F = P->fd;\ assert(P != B);\ assert(P != F);\ assert(chunksize(P) == small_index2size(I));\ if (B == F) {\ clear_smallmap(M, I);\ }\ else if (RTCHECK(ok_address(M, F) && F->bk == P)) {\ F->bk = B;\ B->fd = F;\ }\ else {\ CORRUPTION_ERROR_ACTION(M);\ }\ }

memberdef.name: replace_dv
memberdef.initializer: {\ size_t DVS = M->dvsize;\ assert(is_small(DVS));\ if (DVS != 0) {\ mchunkptr DV = M->dv;\ insert_small_chunk(M, DV, DVS);\ }\ M->dvsize = S;\ M->dv = P;\ }

memberdef.name: insert_chunk
memberdef.initializer: if (is_small(S)) insert_small_chunk(M, P, S)\ else { tchunkptr TP = (tchunkptr)(P); insert_large_chunk(M, TP, S); }

memberdef.name: unlink_chunk
memberdef.initializer: if (is_small(S)) unlink_small_chunk(M, P, S)\ else { tchunkptr TP = (tchunkptr)(P); unlink_large_chunk(M, TP); }
